oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Negroes Reply to Mayor Loeb"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; Willis, A. W., Jr.; Walker, A. Maceo; Lee, George W.; Loeb, Henry; Turner, Jesse H.;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Comments from A. Maceo Walker, Lt. George W. Lee, and Memphis branch of the NAACP president Jesse H. Turner responding to derogatory remarks made by Mayor Loeb.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by Sally Lineback
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: photocopy of newspaper clippings, 3 pages, 8.5 x 11 in.
